comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A Princess Elisaveta (Elisabeth) of Romania was married to George II of Greece. www.flickr.com/photos/33825486@N03/3208682973/ en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elisabeth_of_Romania She wasn't Queen of Greece until 1921, but perhaps Bain wrote that on the negative later, Surely this is the same woman as Which is definitely Princess Elizabeth of Romania

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: From royalromania.wordpress.com/2009/09/01/httpwp-mepaerp-1h9/ it appears that George was already her suitor in 1914. Other pictures of Princess Elisabeth of Romania, later Queen of Greece, are at: www.flickr.com/photos/mrsfujita/4546025912/ www.flickr.com/photos/mrsfujita/4546025470/ And more (and of George) at forum.alexanderpalace.org/index.php?topic=1906.msg244170#...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for information swanq.  We could definitely do better with a caption title for this image.  We'll make the correction next time we update the record.
